item.title: #en @ 1514020210734415877

item.title: #en @ 1513550423487139848
item.description:
Open data means that hard-won output is transferred to more privileged individuals and institutions.
Power flows from the originators to public agencies, private companies and data scientists, mainly in the global North.

item.title: #en @ 1513550421033472002
item.description:
The status quo is shocking. (1) Richest countries have the least tropical forest, but most scientists and economic power. (2) Measuring and Monitoring is skilled, tough work. (3) It often relies on poorly-funded, precarious employment.
Few who demand "open data" recognise this. https://t.co/nvCqbraa9e

item.title: #en @ 1513412606614196227
item.description: It's Monday, here comes my unpopular opinion. We need #OpenScience, we need #OpenData, we need to reform research and its assessment. Do we need yet another Nature editorial or piece or whatever to tell us that? I don't think so.
